title: Isolate
text: To solve for $$h$$, we can first multiply both sides by $$2$$ to get rid of the fraction. Now, we the equation becomes $$2A=bh$$.

title: Solve
text: We can then divide both sides by $$b$$ to isolate $$h$$. Therefore, we get $$h=\frac{2A}{b}$$.
